name: Ghosts Hate Toast
description:
Ghosts Hate Toast

The gluten-free ghosts at the Museum of Ancient Bread are trying to escape! It's up to you and your trusty toaster to stop them.

Made for Godot Wild Jam #26. Themes: Spooky + Bread (and Prehistoric to a lesser extent). Also wildcard: Cheater! (and toasters are kind of mundane, but so is bread, so who knows)

Controls

Mouse - Aim
Left/A - Move left
Right/D - Move right
Space/Click - Shoot toast (you can hold to repeat fire)

Credits

Created by Nisovin, Aeldae (art), and TonyArakawa (sound effects).

Music:

Mischief Maker by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4059-mischief-maker
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Goulish Fun by Eric Matyas
